channel.title: network chart on A Simple Blog
channel.description: Recent content in network chart on A Simple Blog

item.title: pier
item.description: A HTMLWidget wrapper for the Cytoscape.js graph / network visualisation and analysis library. There are already a number of existing R packages for Cytoscape such as the Bioconductor package and the official Cytoscape Widget. The purpose of this package is to make the process of producing a basic chart as simple as possible. Installation devtools::install_github('mrjoh3/cytoscape') A Minimal Example library(cytoscape) nodes <- data.
